results.title: Dose-dependent effect of dobutamine on chemoreflex activity in healthy volunteers.
results.text_hl: No differences were observed between @CHEMICAL_Dobutamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004280 @@@dobutamine@@@ and placebo in the responses to @DISEASE_Hypercapnia @DISEASE_MESH:D006935 @@@hyperoxic hypercapnia@@@ and CPT. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ inhibited the @CHEMICAL_Dobutamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004280 @@@dobutamine@@@-related @DISEASE_Hyperventilation @DISEASE_MESH:D006985 @@@hyperventilation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Apnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001049 @@@apnoea@@@ shortening during normoxia and @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@.
